name: Waiting for October: A Tribute to The Adventures of Pete & Pete
description: 2 Petes. 3 seasons. 5 specials. 26 shorts. 34 episodes. One perfect show. 2 editors. 32 writers and artists. 52 pages of art, words, and comics. One spectacular love letter to the best television of all time. Waiting for October: A Tribute to The Adventures of Pete & Pete is a 52-page, 5.5"x8.5", black-and-white anthology zine with a full-color cover and centerfold. Featuring works by: Joe Quinones (Star Wars, Wednesday Comics) Sara Benincasa (Agorafabulous!) Christopher Hastings (The Adventures of Dr. McNinja) Jen Van Meter (Hopeless Savages) Benito Cereno (Tales from the Bully Pulpit, The Tick) Ashley Davis (Once Upon a Pixel) Kory Bing (Skin Deep) and many, many more! Full contributor list! For wholesale orders, please get in touch using the Contact link on the right!

name: What We Did On Our Summer Vacation: A Pete & Pete Scrapbook
description: What We Did On Our Summer Vacation: A Pete & Pete Scrapbook is a collection of previously unpublished ephemera from behind the scenes of The Adventures of Pete & Pete, including scripts, storyboards, photos, and more; with cover art by Adventure Time creator Pendleton Ward. 22 pages, black & white. Sample pages! All profits from What We Did On Our Summer Vacation: A Pete & Pete Scrapbook go to Portland, Oregon-area arts programs for underserved and homeless youth.
